abstract: Steven Kurutz My Space column describes visit to Upper East Side high-rise condo belonging to Ron Darling, Mets game analyst for SNY and a former baseball player in his own right; Darling describes office space in the apartment as 'New York version of a man cave.'
lead_paragraph: You can have your townhouse. The former pitcher and current Mets commentator prefers the 37th floor.

headline.main: Ron Darling’s Piece of the Sky

snippet: You can have your townhouse. The former pitcher and current Mets commentator prefers the 37th floor.
